section.title: Xlib Compose Keys for km_KH.UTF-8
section.para: Applications using Xlib input handling should recognize these compose key sequences in locales using the km_KH.UTF-8 compose table.

This compose table includes the non-conflicting entries from: /usr/src/octoin/depends/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/share/X11/locale/en_US.UTF-8/Compose. Those entries are not shown here - see those charts for the included key sequences.
